title: Office of Public Works starts ball rolling on GPO redevelopment
content: It has issued a tender for a feasibility study. The documents include few details, but they do confirm the likely future uses for the historic building.

title: How Gen Z is taking a different approach to money - and what others can learn from it
content: Gen Z and younger Millennials no longer consider lifeâ€™s traditional milestones as appropriate for their lives

title: Ireland's young population is keeping public spending down - for now, says IFAC
content: A new report from the Irish Fiscal Advisory Council found that Ireland needs to prepare for a growth in spending as demographics shift and the demand for public services increase.
